BR_text.BRsummary: ray.init() fails with AttributeError: module 'pandas.core' has no attribute 'arrays'
BR_text.BRdescription:
In the current master, ray.init() fails as follows (both on Mac and Linux) (both with pandas 0.22.0 as well as 0.20.3). It succeeds with 0.23.4.
 This is most likely due to <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ray-project/ray/pull/3765>#3765</denchmark-link>
  or <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ray-project/ray/pull/3760>#3760</denchmark-link>
 .
 In [1]: import ray
 ray---------------------------------------------------------------------------
